data: Receiver at ear, Spaulding, of Messrs. Atwater & Spaulding, importers of motoring garments and accessories, listened to the switchboard operator’s announcement with grave attention, acknowledging it with a toneless: “All right. Send him in.”

Receiver at ear, Spaulding, of Messrs. Atwater & Spaulding, importers of motoring garments and accessories, listened to the switchboard operator's announcement with grave attention, acknowledging it with a toneless: "All right. Send him in."
Vance, Louis Joseph, 1879-1933; Smith, Winchell, 1871-1933; Brown, Arthur William, 1881-1966 [Illustrator]
